title: Create dynamic portfolio website with AI assistant and Salesforce integration

requirements.text: Create a home page with a dynamic introduction section displaying user profile picture, name, title (Salesforce Senior Engineer), and professional bio. Content must be editable through a content management interface.

quotes: Where in the home page I will show my introduction with my picture
make every thing dymanic so I can change the image, name, edit the content

acceptanceCriteria: Profile picture is displayed prominently on home page
Name and title are clearly visible
Professional bio from user details is rendered with proper formatting
All content (name, title, bio, picture) can be edited through admin interface

requirements.text: Implement an achievements section that displays awards with pictures and descriptions. Each achievement entry must support an image upload and descriptive text, with ability to add, edit, and delete achievements dynamically.

quotes: there should be a achievement section so that I can showcase my achievement with picture of award
give me the flexibility of modifying the site

acceptanceCriteria: Achievements section displays multiple award entries with images and descriptions
Admin interface allows adding new achievements
Existing achievements can be edited or deleted
Images for achievements can be uploaded and managed

requirements.text: Create a contact form with fields for name, email, message, and any other relevant contact information. Form submissions must be stored in the backend and integrated with Salesforce via REST API to persist contact data in Salesforce CRM.

quotes: if people wants to connect with me they can fill the form, contact me section should be included
I will integrate this website to salesforce to store some data

acceptanceCriteria: Contact form is accessible with clear input fields
Form data is validated before submission
Submissions are stored in backend
Backend integrates with Salesforce REST API to create contact/lead records
User receives confirmation after successful submission

requirements.text: Implement a blog section with capability to create, edit, and display blog posts. Each post should support title, content, publication date, and optional featured image. Blog posts must be manageable through the content management interface.

quotes: In future I may do some blog

acceptanceCriteria: Blog listing page displays all published posts with titles and excerpts
Individual blog post pages show full content with formatting
Admin interface allows creating new blog posts
Blog posts can be edited and deleted
Featured images can be added to blog posts

requirements.text: Create an AI assistant chatbot interface positioned in the bottom right corner of the screen with a custom name and avatar image. The chatbot must display an animated greeting ('Hi, How can I help you?' with waving hands emoji or animation) when a user first visits the page. The chat interface must be designed to integrate with Salesforce Agentforce API for handling user queries.

quotes: add a ai assistant chat screen which will be integrated with salesforce agentforce
give a ai a name and pic in the right side down of the screen
Once people vists my page it has to say hi, How can I help you with showing the hands

acceptanceCriteria: Chat widget appears in bottom right corner with custom AI avatar and name
Greeting message with waving animation appears automatically on first visit
Chat interface allows users to type and send messages
Backend connects to Salesforce Agentforce REST API to process queries
AI responses from Agentforce are displayed in the chat interface
AI name and avatar image can be customized through admin interface

requirements.text: Build a comprehensive content management system (CMS) that allows dynamic editing of all site content including profile information, achievements, blog posts, AI assistant settings, and custom sections. The CMS must support adding new content sections beyond the initial setup.

quotes: make every thing dymanic so I can change the image, name, edit the content, adding section, give me the flexibility of modifying the site
in future I can modify the code and design

acceptanceCriteria: Admin dashboard provides access to all editable content
Profile section (name, title, bio, picture) is fully editable
Achievements can be added, edited, and deleted with image uploads
Blog posts can be created, edited, and deleted
AI assistant name and avatar are customizable
New custom sections can be added to the site through the CMS
Changes are immediately reflected on the public site

requirements.text: Design the frontend with a vibrant, dynamic, and modern aesthetic that avoids simplicity. Implement a cohesive visual theme with bold colors, engaging animations, smooth transitions, and contemporary typography that reflects a tech-forward professional portfolio. Ensure the design is responsive across all devices.

quotes: the page should not be simple it has to be dynamic

acceptanceCriteria: Site uses a vibrant color palette with multiple accent colors
Smooth animations and transitions enhance user experience
Modern typography and layout patterns are implemented
Responsive design works seamlessly on mobile, tablet, and desktop
Visual design feels dynamic and engaging without being overwhelming

constraints: AI assistant must integrate specifically with Salesforce Agentforce API, not generic LLM services
Contact form data must be stored in Salesforce CRM via REST API integration
All content must be dynamically editable without requiring code changes
nonGoals: Building a custom CRM system (using Salesforce integration instead)
Implementing email notification services for form submissions
Creating a multi-user authentication system for the CMS
Supporting real-time chat features beyond the AI assistant

required: Professional portrait photo of a Salesforce engineer for profile picture, corporate style, well-lit (profile-picture.dim_400x400.png)
Friendly AI assistant avatar with a modern tech aesthetic for chatbot interface (ai-assistant-avatar.dim_200x200.png)
Waving hand emoji or animated illustration for chatbot greeting (wave-hand.dim_64x64.png)
Sample achievement award trophy or certificate image as placeholder for achievements section (achievement-placeholder.dim_600x400.png)
Hero section background with abstract tech pattern, vibrant gradients suggesting innovation and technology (hero-background.dim_1920x1080.png)
